document_data.name: Murkolk Szolt
document_data.mainbody: '''Murkolk Szolt'''  was the main [[duergar]] delegate in [[Mantol-Derith]] in [[1372 DR]].
document_data.History: Murkolk become the representative of [[Gracklstugh]] in [[1371 DR]] after his predecessor [[Gradoc Rockhand]] was thrown into the [[Darklake]] for his use of a ''[[thought medallion]]''.
document_data.Personality: Murkolk had a poker face, slept only four hours a night and hid his emotions very well.
